languages.text: "Клинки в руках ваших — не орудие, но продолжение вас. Слейтесь с металлом. Вкусите лезвием кровь!"

traits.locale_text: "Клинки в руках ваших — не орудие, но продолжение вас. Слейтесь с металлом. Вкусите лезвием кровь!"

languages.text: "The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"
languages.original_text: "Клинки в руках ваших — не орудие, но продолжение вас. Слейтесь с металлом. Вкусите лезвием кровь!"

traits.locale_text: "The blades in your hands are not weapons but extensions of yourselves. Blend with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"
"The blades in your hands are not weapons but extensions of yourselves. Blend with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"
"The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"
"The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"
"The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"
"The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"

languages.text: « Les lames dans vos mains ne sont pas de simples armes, mais des extensions de votre organisme. Fusionnez avec le métal. Savourez le goût du sang sur la lame ! »
languages.original_text: "The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"

traits.locale_text: « Les lames dans vos mains ne sont pas de simples armes, mais des extensions de votre organisme. Fusionnez avec le métal. Savourez le goût du sang sur la lame ! »

languages.text: «Las hojas en vuestras manos son extensiones de vuestro mismo cuerpo, no son solo armas. Fundíos con el metal. ¡Saboread la sangre de vuestra espada!».
languages.original_text: "The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"

traits.locale_text: «Las hojas en vuestras manos son extensiones de vuestro mismo cuerpo, no son solo armas. Fundíos con el metal. ¡Saboread la sangre de vuestra espada!».

languages.text: 「お前達の手の中にある刃はただの武器ではなく、己の一部だ。金属とひとつになれ。その刃で血を味わうのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前達の手の中にある刃はただの武器ではなく、己の一部だ。金属とひとつになれ。その刃で血を味わうのだ！」

languages.text: “你们手中的利刃不仅仅是武器，更是身体的延伸。与金属融为一体，用利刃品尝鲜血的味道！”
languages.original_text: "The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"

traits.locale_text: “你们手中的利刃不仅仅是武器，更是身体的延伸。与金属融为一体，用利刃品尝鲜血的味道！”

languages.text: "Die Klingen in Euren Händen sind eine Erweiterung Eurer selbst, keine bloßen Waffen. Verschmelzt mit dem Metall. Schmeckt mit Eurer Klinge das Blut!"
languages.original_text: "The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Klingen in Euren Händen sind eine Erweiterung Eurer selbst, keine bloßen Waffen. Verschmelzt mit dem Metall. Schmeckt mit Eurer Klinge das Blut!"

languages.text: "Ellerinizdeki kılıçlar, sıradan silahlar değildir. Sizin birer parçanızdır. Metalle bir olun. Kılıcınızla kanın tadına bakın!"
languages.original_text: "The blades in your hands are extensions of yourselves, not mere weapons. Merge with the metal. Taste the blood with your blade!"
